channel.title: Connection With Patcher/Mac lost
channel.description:
Hi there, I've had some great days of patching and discovering Axoloti but unfortunately it seems to have lost connection with my computer. I was working on a patch and inbetween I rebooted my Macbook. After the reboot the axoloti is only running in standalone mode, so the latest patch I dropped on there is making sound but it doesn't connect to the patcher anymore. This is really frustrating, since I've discovered some great things here.
I run a 15" Retina Macbook Pro with 10.10.5. I've already tried changing the USB cable and checked if my USB ports work with other devices, they work.
P.S. I also reinstalled the Axoloti App and the Runtime. And it is being recognized as a Midi Device in Ableton.

item.title: Connection With Patcher/Mac lost
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Ok I don't know how but the patcher is back.

I've followed thetechnobear's instruction here, http://community.axoloti.com/t/mac-software-no-menus-or-windows/366
so I deleted axoloti.prefs file and run this terminal code. First it didn't work but then it was back suddenly.

This is the code terminal got me in case you need it for debugging:

Simons-MBP:~ Simon$ /Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/MacOS/Axoloti

item.title: Connection With Patcher/Mac lost
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Hi there, I've had some great days of patching and discovering Axoloti but unfortunately it seems to have lost connection with my computer. I was working on a patch and inbetween I rebooted my Macbook. After the reboot the axoloti is only running in standalone mode, so the latest patch I dropped on there is making sound but it doesn't connect to the patcher anymore. This is really frustrating, since I've discovered some great things here.

I run a 15" Retina Macbook Pro with 10.10.5. I've already tried changing the USB cable and checked if my USB ports work with other devices, they work.

P.S. I also reinstalled the Axoloti App and the Runtime.
And it is being recognized as a Midi Device in Ableton.

Read full topic
